markdown:
Support

# Forms & transactions

## Manage your account(s), complete transaction requests online, and find other useful information.

## Forms & transactions by category

- [Open an account\\
Apply to various accounts](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/forms/open-an-account)
- [Move money in\\
Rollovers, contributions and transfers](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/forms/forms-to-move-money-in)
- [Update beneficiaries\\
Change, add or remove your beneficiaries](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/forms/beneficiaries)
- [Manage your money\\
Account management and investment information](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/forms/manage-your-account)
- [Take money out\\
Loans, withdrawals, payouts, retirement income and distributions](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/forms/forms-to-take-money-out)
- [Find tax information\\
Federal reporting, state reporting and withholding](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/forms/tax-forms)
- [Brokerage Forms Library\\
Find all forms for Brokerage and Managed accounts here](https://www.tiaa.org/public/invest/financial-products/brokerage-accounts/brokerage-forms)

## Common transactions

-
Move funds into your employer-sponsored plan at TIAA



Use this request to move funds from your other financial company into your employer-sponsored plans at TIAA.


[Move fundsMove fundsOpens in new window](https://shared.tiaa.org/private/participantmoneyin/account-funding/get-started)
-
Move funds into a new or existing IRA at TIAA



Make a separate request for each investment company you're transferring or rolling over from.


[Move fundsMove fundsOpens in new window](https://shared.tiaa.org/private/partretailtxns/funding/accounts)
-
Authorize others to discuss your accounts with a TIAA representative



Authorization allows another person or organization to discuss your accounts, receive information, view information or via download, and act on your behalf.


[Make authorizationMake authorizationOpens in new window](https://digitalforms.tiaa.org/auth/saml?idp=tiaa-dff-digitalforms-sso-external&destination=%23%2Fdisplay%2F60beedf107579c02e0a5af62%3FformNumber%3DF10352)
-
Update a name on your account



Submit supporting documentation of marriage, divorce, adoption, court order or other reason for name change with your request.


[Update nameUpdate nameOpens in new window](https://digitalforms.tiaa.org/auth/saml?idp=tiaa-dff-digitalforms-sso-external&destination=%23%2Fdisplay%2F60beedf107579c02e0a5af62%3FformNumber%3DF82)
-
Update your TIAA account beneficiaries



Change, add, or remove the beneficiaries on your TIAA account(s).


[Update beneficiariesUpdate beneficiariesOpens dialog](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/forms#modal-291913917)
-
Brokerage Forms Library



Find all forms for Brokerage and Managed accounts here


[Brokerage forms libraryBrokerage forms library](https://www.tiaa.org/public/invest/financial-products/brokerage-accounts/brokerage-forms)
